name: Hi,I'm Hunain Mahudawala
role: Full-Stack Developer from India, dedicated to creating user-friendly applications.
about: I am currently pursuing Full-Stack Web Development at Parul University. My goal is to create elegant and highly usable web products. As an innovative and detail-oriented developer, I am passionate about building responsive and user-friendly websites. I have experience in UI design, testing, and debugging, and I excel at self-managing independent projects.

projects.title: Sales Reflect
projects.description: A web/mobile app for sales teams to log customer details, sales, and transactions. Data is securely stored in the cloud and shown on a real-time admin dashboard. Goal: Simplify data management, reduce manual work, and improve decisions.

projects.title: JobZee
projects.description: The JobZee is a web-based platform designed to facilitate the job search process for individuals seeking employment. The application provides a user-friendly interface for job seekers to create and manage their profiles, search for job openings, and apply to positions that match their skills and preferences.
